titles.title: To provide for a greater number of members on certain combined Farm Service Agency county committees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 4/2/2004--Introduced. Amends the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to provide for a greater number of members on certain combined Farm Service Agency county committees.
